com.google.android.exoplayer2.text.webvtt

Class CssParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.text.webvtt.CssParser

  • final class CssParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a CSS parser for STYLE blocks in Webvtt files. Supports only a subset of the CSS features.

    • Method Detail

      • parseBlock

        public WebvttCssStyle parseBlock(ParsableByteArray input)
        Takes a CSS style block and consumes up to the first empty line found. Attempts to parse the contents of the style block and returns a WebvttCssStyle instance if successful, or null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        input - The input from which the style block should be read.
        Returns:
        A WebvttCssStyle that represents the parsed block.

      • parseSelector

        private static java.lang.String parseSelector(ParsableByteArray input,
                                              java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Returns a string containing the selector. The input is expected to have the form ::cue(tag#id.class1.class2[voice="someone"], where every element is optional.
        Parameters:
        input - From which the selector is obtained.
        Returns:
        A string containing the target, empty string if the selector is universal (targets all cues) or null if an error was encountered.

      • readCueTarget

        private static java.lang.String readCueTarget(ParsableByteArray input)
        Reads the contents of ::cue() and returns it as a string.
